Michael Dudikoff stars as Joe Armstrong a martial artist who fights ninjas who are stealing weapons from the U.S Army, in this entertaining yet admittedly brainless comedic action film. This film is going to have you laughing like no other martial arts film ; It's actually the first martial arts film to have me laughing so much. It is a heartfelt and sincere martial arts comedy acted like a Schwarzenegger movie with low budget effects . This is one you can't miss
